import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import Axios from "axios"; import io from "socket.io-client"; import "./Chats.css"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faPaperPlane } from "@fortawesome/fontawesome-free-solid"; let socket; const Chat = (props) => { const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); let friend = props.match.params.friend; let storedSession = sessionStorage.getItem("storedSession"); let user = storedSession; const sendMessage = (messageData) => { Axios.post( "/messages", { username: messageData.username, friend: messageData.friend, message: user.message, }, { withCredentials: true, crossdomain: true, } ); console.log(messageData); }; return (

  • Vincent 10:12 AM, Today
    Are we meeting today? Project has been already finished and I have results to show you.
  • 10:14 AM, Today   Olia
    Well I am not sure. The rest of the team is not here yet. Maybe in an hour or so? Have you faced any problems at the last phase of the project?
  • Vincent 10:20 AM, Today
    Actually everything was fine. I'm very excited to show this to our team.
sendMessage({ user, friend, message })} className="send-button" icon={faPaperPlane} />
); }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({}); const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => ({}); export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Chat); // socket.emit("Message", { //message: "hello", //username: user, //friend: friend, //}); // socket.emit("Conversation", { user, friend }, () => {}); //console.log(socket);
